Scene:
In front of the Storehouse
(Kuramae / 蔵前)

Play: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (染模様妹背門松)

Production: January 1977

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Shimatayū VIII (豊竹嶋大夫 (八))



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Danjirō IV (see also Takezawa Danshichi) (竹澤団二郎 (四))

Takezawa Yasaburō (see also Nozawa Kichinosuke) (竹澤弥三郎)
